text: Holmes Rolston III (November 19, 1932 â€“ February 12, 2025) was an American philosopher. He was a professor at Colorado State University. He was best known for his works to environmental ethics and the relationship between science and religion. Rolston won the 2003 Templeton Prize, awarded by Prince Philip in Buckingham Palace. Rolston III died on February 12, 2025, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American philosophers Category:Writers from Colorado Category:Academics from Colorado Category:American theologians
title: Holmes Rolston III
